import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Leftmenu from "./Navigation/Leftmenu"; import Header from "./Navigation/Header"; class CustomerRegistation extends Component { state = { response: '', post: '', responseToPost: '', }; componentDidMount() { const tokenString = sessionStorage.getItem('token'); const userToken = JSON.parse(tokenString); const customerIDString = sessionStorage.getItem('customerID'); const customerID = parseInt(customerIDString); this.setState({ Token: userToken }); this.setState({ customerID: customerID }); const roleString = sessionStorage.getItem('userRole'); const userRole = JSON.parse(roleString); this.handleOnloadDate = (str) => { const m = str.split("/"); let str_date = m[1] + "/" + m[2] + "/" + m[0]; return str_date; } this.setState({ userRole: userRole }); this.setState({ mn: this.props.mn}); this.setState({ ptFirstName: this.props.ptFirstName}); this.setState({ ptLastName: this.props.ptLastName}); this.setState({ psalu: this.props.psalu}); this.setState({ pGender: this.props.pGender}); this.setState({ PAge: this.props.PAge}); this.setState({ pEmail: this.props.pEmail}); this.setState({ pHusbandName: this.props.pHusbandName}); this.setState({ pAddress: this.props.pAddress}); this.setState({ pCity: this.props.pCity}); this.setState({ pState: this.props.pState}); this.setState({ pPortalConsent: this.props.pPortalConsent}); this.setState({ datee: this.props.datee}); this.setState({ obsNobs: this.props.obsNobs}); this.setState({ pMaritalStatus: this.props.pMaritalStatus}); this.setState({ pid: this.props.Patient_id}); console.log(this.props.Patient_id); } handleSubmit = async e => { e.preventDefault(); const requestHeader = { "content-Type": "application/json", accessIDKey: this.state.Token }; const response = await fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/Patients/setPatient', { method: 'POST', headers: requestHeader, body: JSON.stringify({ patientID:this.state.pid, Salutation: this.state.psalu, patientGender: this.state.pGender, patientAge: this.state.PAge, patientEmail: this.state.pEmail, patientHusbandName: this.state.pHusbandName, patientAddress: this.state.pAddress, patientCity: this.state.pCity, patientState: this.state.pState, patientPortalConsent: this.state.pPortalConsent, customerID: this.state.customerID, customerCategory: "Gynecologist", patientFirstName: this.state.ptFirstName, patientLastName: this.state.ptLastName, patientMobileNumber: this.state.mn, LMP: this.state.datee, ObsNonObs: this.state.obsNobs, patientMaritalStatus: this.state.pMaritalStatus }), }); const body = await response.text(); this.setState({ responseToPost: body }); // After Appointment Added alert("Customer Updated Successfully"); }; render() { return (
